wf_workflow_version.name: LH Opera Configuration Form
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

sys_variable_value.value: Opera Configuration Form request for ${number} ${short_description} has been Completed.

The following Opera Configuration Form has been Completed. 
 
Short Description: ${sysapproval.short_description}
State: ${sysapproval.state}
Requested by: ${sysapproval.opened_by}
 
 
${mail_script:itil.approver.approve.sso.operaconfig_script_1}
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

wf_activity.name: Loews Hotels Opera Configuration Work in Progress Notification

sys_variable_value.value:
Note: Opera Configuration Request # ${number} is being worked on.
 
 
 
Description: ${description}
 
 
Date Opened: ${opened_at}
 
 
Reported By: ${opened_by.name}
 
 
 
You will be contacted as soon as possible when your request has been completed.
